SYN_BRONCH_2_3:
CPT Coding Substantiation:
- 31627 (Navigation): Computer-assisted image guidance (SuperDimension) was utilized to navigate to the RLL superior segment lesion.
- 31654 (Peripheral EBUS): Radial EBUS probe used to confirm lesion location prior to biopsy.
- 31628 (TBLB): Transbronchial biopsies (forceps) taken from the RLL single lobe.
- 31653 (EBUS-TBNA): Real-time EBUS guidance used to sample 3 distinct mediastinal stations: 4L, 7, and 4R. (Supports >2 stations code).
